caption.p: OPLS-DA scores plots of LJF exposed to different salt stress conditions compared with control under negative (a, c, e, and g) and positive (b, d, f, and h) ion modes, respectively. a and b, salt vs control; c and d, 100 mM salt vs control; e and f 200 mM salt vs control; g and h 300 mM salt vs control. 95% confidence regions are displayed for each treatment.
